channel.title: GitHub Trending - Ruby (Weekly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Ruby nel periodo weekly

item.title: 📝 snowyfizz/CLI-Toolkit-Boilerplate (23 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: snowyfizz

📝 Repository: snowyfizz/CLI-Toolkit-Boilerplate

📄 Descrizione: ⌨️ CLI-Toolkit-Boilerplate: A starter kit for building powerful dan elegant command-line interface (CLI) tools. 🧰 Includes argument parsing dan colorized output. ⚙️
